content.description:
You will participate in a simulated exchange of text-chat messages. Each time it is your turn, you will have 90 seconds to respond. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. Type your response in the target language. 

You will have a conversation with Yumiko Sato, a Japanese language professor, about learning Japanese.
content.question:
Ask some specific questions.
ところで、大学での日本語の勉強について何か質問をしてください。

frqParts.text:
Ask some specific questions.
ところで、大学での日本語の勉強について何か質問をしてください。

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
